snippet.title: Cities: VR | Announcement Trailer (Meta Quest 2 / Captured on PC)
snippet.description:
Be the mayor in Cities: VR, the ultimate VR city-building and management simulator. Step through the screen and control every aspect of city planning - design neighborhoods, construct buildings, direct the flow of traffic - all while you handle economics, emergency services, and more. Cities: VR brings the definitive city-building experience from Cities: Skylines into VR for the very first time. 

Launching on Meta Quest 2 in Spring 2022!

(Video captured on PC)

Follow Cities: VR here:
• Twitter - https://twitter.com/CitiesVR
• Facebook - https://facebook.com/CitiesVR
• Instagram - https://instagram.com/CitiesVR
• Discord - https://discord.gg/fasttravelgames

Read more about the game on https://www.fasttravelgames.com/games/citiesvr
